languages.text: {n}Женщина перед вами излучает чуждую красоту — костяной гребень на лбу, фиолетовый отлив кожи и изящные когтистые пальцы выдают в ней ксеносскую кровь. Ее одеяния схожи с робой старого мутанта, которого вы предали казни в фамильном склепе, а осанка — статная и властная. Сапфировый свет сочится из-под полуопущенных век, а губы растянуты в надменной ухмылке.{/n}

{n}The woman before you radiates an alien beauty — the bony crest on her forehead, the violet tint of her skin, and the graceful, clawed fingers give away her xenos heritage. Her robes resemble those of the old mutant you put to death in the family crypt, and her posture is regal and powerful. Sapphire light oozes from beneath the half-lowered eyelids, and a haughty smirk stretches her lips.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mujer que ves frente a ti irradia una belleza alienígena: el emblema de hueso de su frente, el color violeta de su piel y los elegantes dedos terminados en garras son prueba de su herencia xenos. Sus ropajes se asemejan a los del viejo mutante al que mataste en la cripta familiar, y su postura es señorial y poderosa. Una luz color zafiro surge de sus párpados medio cerrados, y una sonrisa arrogante estira sus labios.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman before you radiates an alien beauty — the bony crest on her forehead, the violet tint of her skin, and the graceful, clawed fingers give away her xenos heritage. languages.text: {n}女は人間離れした美しさを放っている…額にある骨の紋章、紫がかった肌、優雅な爪のある指が、彼女が異種族の血を引いていることを物語っていた。彼女のローブは、一族の地下墓場で死に追いやった昔の変異体のものに似ており、その立ち姿は堂々として力強い。半開きのまぶたの下からはサファイアの光がにじみ、唇には高慢な笑みが浮かんでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman before you radiates an alien beauty — the bony crest on her forehead, the violet tint of her skin, and the graceful, clawed fingers give away her xenos heritage. Her robes resemble those of the old mutant you put to death in the family crypt, and her posture is regal and powerful. Sapphire light oozes from beneath the half-lowered eyelids, and a haughty smirk stretches her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}女は人間離れした美しさを放っている…額にある骨の紋章、紫がかった肌、優雅な爪のある指が、彼女が異種族の血を引いていることを物語っていた。彼女のローブは、一族の地下墓場で死に追いやった昔の変異体のものに似ており、その立ち姿は堂々として力強い。半開きのまぶたの下からはサファイアの光がにじみ、唇には高慢な笑みが浮かんでいる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你面前的这个女人散发着充满异种风情的美感。无论是她额头上的骨冠，紫罗兰色的皮肤，还是长着利爪的优雅指节，都彰显着她的异形血统。她身上的长袍很像你之前在家族墓穴中杀死的老变种人身上的长袍。她的姿态威严，充满力量，半垂的眼睑渗着蓝宝石般的光芒，嘴角露出了得意而傲慢的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman before you radiates an alien beauty — the bony crest on her forehead, the violet tint of her skin, and the graceful, clawed fingers give away her xenos heritage. Her robes resemble those of the old mutant you put to death in the family crypt, and her posture is regal and powerful. Sapphire light oozes from beneath the half-lowered eyelids, and a haughty smirk stretches her lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你面前的这个女人散发着充满异种风情的美感。无论是她额头上的骨冠，紫罗兰色的皮肤，还是长着利爪的优雅指节，都彰显着她的异形血统。她身上的长袍很像你之前在家族墓穴中杀死的老变种人身上的长袍。她的姿态威严，充满力量，半垂的眼睑渗着蓝宝石般的光芒，嘴角露出了得意而傲慢的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Frau vor dir strahlt eine andersweltliche Schönheit aus. Der knöcherne Kamm auf ihrer Stirn, ihr violetter Teint und die eleganten, mit Krallen besetzten Finger verraten ihre Xenos-Herkunft. Ihre Roben ähneln denen des alten Mutanten, den du in der Familienkrypta getötet hast, und ihre Haltung ist majestätisch und mächtig. Saphirfarbenes Licht strahlt aus den halb geschlossenen Augenlidern, und ein hochmütiges Lächeln liegt auf ihren Lippen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman before you radiates an alien beauty — the bony crest on her forehead, the violet tint of her skin, and the graceful, clawed fingers give away her xenos heritage. Her robes resemble those of the old mutant you put to death in the family crypt, and her posture is regal and powerful. Sapphire light oozes from beneath the half-lowered eyelids, and a haughty smirk stretches her lips.{/n}

Saphirfarbenes Licht strahlt aus den halb geschlossenen Augenlidern, und ein hochmütiges Lächeln liegt auf ihren Lippen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La femme qui se tient devant vous est d'une indubitable beauté, bien que la crête osseuse qui orne son front, la teinte violette de sa peau et les griffes qui terminent ses doigts trahissent son héritage xénos. Sa tenue, semblable à celle du vieux mutant que vous avez mis à mort dans la crypte familiale, n'est rendue que plus royale par sa posture pleine d'assurance et de charisme. Un sourire hautain étire ses lèvres tandis qu'elle pose sur vous l'éclat saphir de son regard à peine visible derrière ses paupières mi-closes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman before you radiates an alien beauty — the bony crest on her forehead, the violet tint of her skin, and the graceful, clawed fingers give away her xenos heritage. Sapphire light oozes from beneath the half-lowered eyelids, and a haughty smirk stretches her lips.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Önündeki kadın, yabancı bir güzelliğe sahip. Alnındaki kemikli yapı, derisinin kızıl rengi ve pençeli zarif parmakları, zeno soyundan geldiğini belli ediyor. Kıyafetleri, mahzende öldürdüğün ihtiyar mutantınkileri andırıyor. Duruşu asil, kudret sahibi olduğunu gösteriyor. Safir mavisi bir ışık, yarımca kapattığı göz kapaklarının altından sızıyor. Mağrur bir tebessüm dudaklarını geriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman before you radiates an alien beauty — the bony crest on her forehead, the violet tint of her skin, and the graceful, clawed fingers give away her xenos heritage. Her robes resemble those of the old mutant you put to death in the family crypt, and her posture is regal and powerful. Sapphire light oozes from beneath the half-lowered eyelids, and a haughty smirk stretches her lips.{/n}
